contentrichtext.text: '''Sunnyside''' and '''Sunny Side''' may refer to: {{TOC right}} ==Places== === Australia === *[[Sunnyside (Cooranbong, Australia)]], house of [[Ellen G. White]], co-founder of the Seventh-day Adventist Church === Canada === * [[Sunnyside (Surrey)|Sunnyside]], a suburban area of [[South Surrey]], in turn a town centre of [[Surrey, British Columbia]] * [[Sunnyside, Calgary]], a community in Calgary, Alberta, Canada * [[Sunnyside, Newfoundland and Labrador]], Canada * [[Sunnyside, Toronto]], a lakeshore district in Toronto, Ontario, Canada ===New Zealand=== * [[Sunnyside Hospital]], a former mental asylum in Christchurch, New Zealand === South Africa === *[[Sunnyside, Pretoria]], a neighbourhood in central Pretoria, South Africa === United Kingdom === *[[Sunnyside, Hitchin]], a neighbourhood in Hitchin, England *[[Sunnyside, Rotherham]], a village near Bramley, South Yorkshire, England === United States === (by state) *[[Sunnyside, California (disambiguation)]] **[[Sunnyside, Fresno County, California]] **[[Sunnyside, Mendocino County, California]] **[[Sunnyside, Placer County, California]] **[[Sunnyside, San Diego County, California]] **[[Sunnyside, San Francisco, California]] **[[Sunnyside, Tehama County, California]] **[[Sunnyside-Tahoe City, California]] *[[Sunnyside, Denver]], Colorado, a neighborhood of [[Denver, Indiana *[[Sunnyside High School (disambiguation)]], multiple schools *[[Sunnyside Primary School]] in Sunnyside, Pretoria, Republic of South Africa == Other uses == *[[Sunnyside (film)|''Sunnyside'' (film)]], a 1919 film by Charlie Chaplin *[[Sunnyside (1979 film)|''Sunnyside'' (1979 film)]], starring [[Joey Travolta]] *[[Sunnyside Amusement Park]], a former amusement park in Toronto *[[Sunnyside
